short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An ultra-secure application to store, swap, and trade all of your favorite digital assests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The purpose of the extension is to make blockchain transactions which include sending, receiving and storing digital assets secure and a touch away for the users.
It comes with DexiSwap which will allow the users to swap their digital asset with a relevant token.
